General.Name: Sangfor Technologies Inc Class A
General.Description: Sangfor Technologies Inc. provides IT infrastructure solutions in China and internationally. The company specializes in the provision of cloud computing, and network security solutions. It offers network security products, including Internet access gateway products; NGAF firewall platform; endpoint secure; cyber command solutions; and cloud-based SASE for branch offices and remote users. The company also provides cloud solutions covering hyper-converged infrastructure solutions; cloud platform enterprise cloud services; and managed cloud platform. In addition, it offers virtual desktop infrastructure, intelligent edge router, SD-WAN, and WAN optimization solutions; and security services. The company serves manufacturing, education, finance and banking, government, healthcare, and ISP industries. Sangfor Technologies Inc. was founded in 2000 and is based in Shenzhen, China.
